edu.brown.cs.systems.tracingplane.atom_layer.types

Class ProtobufVarint

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.systems.tracingplane.atom_layer.types.ProtobufVarint

  • public class ProtobufVarint
extends java.lang.Object
    Duplicates logic of Protocol Buffers variable length integer encoding, but with different logic for exceptions. This enables us to handle end-of-stream differently to malformed length prefix exceptions or other IO exceptions
